channel.title: [PI] godsword animations
channel.description:
Some anims for weapons don't work. Example: Primal maul should have the maul standing pose but it doesn't. Godswords, sara sword, dragon 2h don't attack normally, they attack like a longsword or scimitar. [code] case 11694: case 11696: case 11698: case 11700: case 7158: case 11730: return 7041;[/code]
[code] case 16425: c.playerStandIndex = 1662; c.playerWalkIndex = 1663; c.playerRunIndex = 1664; break;[/code]

item.title: [PI] godsword animations
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So I’m just going to ask this one more time:

sk8rdude461:

So can you tell us where those snippets came from instead of just throwing us code?

Also, whatever is containing that code, make sure it’s being called properly…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] godsword animations
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:5, topic:537232”][quote author=Pkor159 link=topic=656048.msg4390860#msg4390860 date=1387466429]

So can you tell us where those snippets came from instead of just throwing us code? Also, test the anims yourself by using the ::anim command. If they don’t work properly you probably have the wrong ID’s or don’t even have the anims.

All of those anims work. It’s only for godswords the godswords don’t do the anims.
[/quote]
Is Eclipse / Your Compiler throwing out any error at the process when using godswords?[/quote]
No. I’m not a complete idiot…

Read full topic
